main event: An unidentified object was observed in Nevada in August 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as lens-shaped and silver in color., It moved erratically at an altitude of approximately 2000-3000 ft., The observation lasted for about 30 minutes before the object was lost in haze., Witnesses included a weatherman stationed at the Mercury Test Site., The object was likely to be an aircraft based on its flight characteristics and altitude.
witness description: a weatherman stationed at the Mercury Test Site
